description:
Other operating income

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services

Definition:
Other operating income comprises, in particular, income from
renting and leasing, fees for patents, trademarks and
licences. This also includes assets yet accruing although
they were written off in previous years. However, income
from participating interests, securities, interest income
and other financial income are not included.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Other operating income
